mutants.code:
import string
import re
from collections import Counter

def long_word_count(sentence, num):
    sentence = re.sub('', '', sentence)
    words = sentence.split()
    long_words = [word.lower() for word in words if len(word) > num]
    word_count = dict(Counter(long_words))
    return word_count

import string
import re
from collections import Counter

def long_word_count(sentence, num):
    sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', sentence)
    words = sentence.split()
    long_words = [word.lower() for word in words if len(word) > num]
    word_count = dict(Counter(long_words))
    return word_count

mutants.original_line: long_words = [word.lower() for word in words if len(word) > num]
mutants.mutated_line: long_words = [word.lower() for word in words if len(word) >= num]

mutants.code:
import string
import re
from collections import Counter

def long_word_count(sentence, num):
    sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', sentence)
    words = sentence.split()
    long_words = [word.lower() for word in words if len(word) <= num]
    word_count = dict(Counter(long_words))
    return word_count

mutants.original_line: long_words = [word.lower() for word in words if len(word) > num]
mutants.mutated_line: long_words = [word.lower() for word in words if len(word) != num]
mutants.code:
import string
import re
from collections import Counter

def long_word_count(sentence, num):
    sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', sentence)
    words = sentence.split()
    long_words = [word.lower() for word in words if len(word) != num]
    word_count = dict(Counter(long_words))
    return word_count
